thread.title_full: A charming get away at the heart of St. Germain - Review of Hotel des Marronniers, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Souraya S
title: A charming get away at the heart of St. Germain
text:
As charming as Paris itself, this little hotel is excellent for a quick get away. Perfect location in the nicest area (Saint Germain) lovely service, and heartwarming atmosphere, I would highly recommend it. As someone who often gors to Paris, I couldn't have askd for a more delightful experience.
Room Tip: 63 is bar far the nicest See more room tips
